item.title: iPhone and iPad Web App Startup Images
item.description: In order to avoid having a blank white screen when launching a web app, you can use a apple-touch-startup-image. This is displayed momentarily while the web app is loading. There are a number of link tags to target all iPhone and iPad devices which you must use. But there’s also a very important thing to not do, and that is to not use width=device-width on the viewport meta tag because this will letterbox the viewport and it will not work.
